typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		date as string,
		states as string,
		positive as string,
		negative as string,
		pending as string,
		hospitalizedCurrently as string,
		hospitalizedCumulative as string,
		inIcuCurrently as string,
		inIcuCumulative as string,
		onVentilatorCurrently as string,
		onVentilatorCumulative as string,
		dateChecked as string,
		death as string,
		hospitalized as string,
		totalTestResults as string,
		lastModified as string,
		recovered as string,
		total as string,
		posNeg as string,
		deathIncrease as string,
		hospitalizedIncrease as string,
		negativeIncrease as string,
		positiveIncrease as string,
		totalTestResultsIncrease as string,
		hash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		Column_1,
		Column_2,
		Column_3,
		Column_4,
		Column_5,
		Column_6,
		Column_7,
		Column_8,
		Column_9,
		Column_10,
		Column_11,
		Column_12,
		Column_13,
		Column_14,
		Column_15,
		Column_16,
		Column_17,
		Column_18,
		Column_19,
		Column_20,
		Column_21,
		Column_22,
		Column_23,
		Column_24,
		Column_25
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
